field.name: summary
field.value: SmtpClient should be disposed in DefaultSmtpSender

field.name: description
field.value:
There is a background thread running in IIS using DefaultSmtpSender to send emails in our system. It stop sending emails after running a period of time (1-2 days). And I have to manually recycle IIS application pool to make it running again.
Exception Message:
2014-02-25 02:48:09.7826 Error Castle.Proxies.EmailSendingTaskProxy An error occured while sending email to xxxxx@xxxx.net, retried 5 System.Net.Mail.SmtpException: Failure sending mail. ---> System.Net.WebException: The request was aborted: The request was canceled. at System.Net.ConnectionPool.Get(Object owningObject, Int32 result, Boolean& continueLoop, WaitHandle[]& waitHandles) at System.Net.ConnectionPool.GetConnection(Object owningObject, GeneralAsyncDelegate asyncCallback, Int32 creationTimeout) at System.Net.Mail.SmtpConnection.GetConnection(ServicePoint servicePoint) at System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send(MailMessage message) --- End of inner exception stack trace --- at System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send(MailMessage message) at Castle.Core.Smtp.DefaultSmtpSender.InternalSend(MailMessage message) at Drachma.Web.Core.Services.Messaging.Mail.SmtpSenderWrapper.Send(String type, MailMessage message) in c:\CEBuildagent1\work\9680b34019af5164\src\Drachma.Web\Core\Services\Messaging\Mail\ISmtpEmailSender.cs:line 44 at Castle.DynamicProxy.AbstractInvocation.Proceed() at Drachma.Web.Core.Services.Messaging.Mail.EmailSendingTask.Send(QueuedEmail email) in c:\CEBuildagent1\work\9680b34019af5164\src\Drachma.Web\Core\Services\Messaging\Mail\EmailSendingTask.cs:line 87 at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Execute() --- End of stack trace from previous location where exception was thrown --- at System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.ExceptionDispatchInfo.Throw() at System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TaskAwaiter.HandleNonSuccessAndDebuggerNotification(Task task) at Drachma.Web.Core.Services.Messaging.Mail.EmailSendingTask.<SendAsync>d__9.MoveNext() in c:\CEBuildagent1\work\9680b34019af5164\src\Drachma.Web\Core\Services\Messaging\Mail\EmailSendingTask.cs:line 58
What I guess here is that SmtpCilent is not disposed in DefaultSmtpSender results in System.Net.ConnectionPool running out of connections, am I right?

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: That sounds about right. We dispose of the message but not of the sender.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: Submitted this to github https://github.com/castleproject/Core/issues/46 for someone to grab and pull request. This is a trivial change

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text:
Actually, after reading some documentation, I'm not sure that 1. not callling `Dispose()` is the source of your problem 2. We want to be calling `Dispose()`
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.net.mail.smtpclient.dispose%28v=vs.110%29.aspx`
